title: ‘Winter is on’: The New England ski season has begun as two major resorts open on Wednesday
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Travel The resorts opened for passholders on Wednesday and open to the public on Thursday.
Opening day at Vermont's Killington Resort in 2019.
Killington By Kristi Palma November 12, 2025 | 3:04 PM 1 minute to read Skiers and riders hit the slopes Wednesday morning after two major New England ski resorts opened for the season.

title: Cambridge School Committee election results changed after test ballots mistakenly counted
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Politics One candidate was crowned a winner last week, only to get bumped down in the rankings once city officials discovered the ballot-counting error.
Cambridge City Hall.

Zack Wittman/The Boston Globe, File By Abby Patkin November 12, 2025 | 2:33 PM 2 minutes to read Cambridge was forced to walk back the preliminary results of last week’s School Committee race after the vendor overseeing the city’s election system failed to clear more than 2,000 test ballots.

title: Report finds loopholes, permitting slowdown are worsening Greater Boston housing crisis

title: Here’s why sharing your boyfriend online is so ’embarrassing’
